title: Gordon splits
creator_credit: Michael Cordell, Sydney Filmmakers Co-operative and Wilderness Society (Australia)
brief_description: Peter Dombrovskis, Australia’s foremost Wilderness photographer, photographs two spectacular gorges in South West Tasmania. He talks about his own experience of wilderness and the threat of flooding.
creator_credit_for_label: Michael Cordell, Sydney Filmmakers Co-operative and Wilderness Society (Australia)
